translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بگو: او خدای یکتاست؛

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: بگو: اوست خداى يكتا،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: بگو حق اين است كه خدا يگانه است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: بگو: «اوست خداى يگانه،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: بگو: حقیقت این است که خدا یکتاست.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: بگو: خدا، یگانه‌ی یکتا است. [[«اللهُ»: اسم خاصّ آفریدگار هستی است. «أَحَدٌ»: یکتا. یگانه.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: بگو او خداوند یگانه است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: بگو: خداوند، یکتا و یگانه است؛

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: بگو او است خدای یکتا

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: بگو: حق اين است كه خدا يكتا و يگانه است،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: بگو: «او خدای یکتا و یگانه است.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: SAY: "HE IS God the one the most unique,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “He is Allah, He is One.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Say: 'He is God, One,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Say thou: He is Allah, the One!

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Say (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)): "He is Allah, (the) One.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Say, “He is God, the One.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Say: “He is Allah, the One and Unique;

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Say: "He is Allah, One."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Say: He is Allah, the One!

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Say, ‘He is Allah, the One.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Say: 'He is Allah, the One,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: (Muhammad), say, "He is the only God.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Say: He, Allah, is One.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Qul huwa Allahu ahadun

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Say, "He is God, the One,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Say: He is Allah, the One and Only;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: خدای بی نیاز [همه موجودات هستی که نیازمند و عین فقرند برای رفع نیازشان روی به او کنند و از حضرتش گدایی نمایند.]

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: خداى كه در حاجت به او رو كنند،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: خدايى كه همه، نياز بدو برند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: خداى صمد [ثابت - متعالى‌]،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: آن خدایی که (از همه عالم) بی نیاز (و همه عالم به او نیازمند) است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: خدا، سَرورِ والای برآورنده‌ی امیدها و برطرف‌کننده‌ی نیازمندیها است. [[«الصَّمَدُ»: سَرورِ والائی که برای رفع حوائج و دفع مصائب، تنها بدو رو کنند. می‌توان واژه‌های رائج در زبان فارسی همچون «حضرت والا، قبله عالم، کعبه آمال» را مفاهیمی از واژه «صمد» دانست.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: خداوند صمد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: خداوندی است که همه نیازمندان قصد او می‌کنند؛

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: خداوند است صمد

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: خدا تنها بى‌نيازى است كه نيازها بدو برند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «خدا، (همان) پروردگار بی‌نیاز مطلق است.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: God the immanently indispensable.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “Allah is the Un-wanting.” (Perfect, does not require anything.)

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: God, the Everlasting Refuge,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Allah, the Independent,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "Allah-us-Samad (The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He neither eats nor drinks).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: God, the Absolute.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Allah, Who is in need of none and of Whom all are in need;

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Allah As-Samad."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Allah, the eternally Besought of all!

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Allah is the All-embracing.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: the called upon.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: God is Absolute.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Allah is He on Whom all depend.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Allahu alssamadu

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: God, the Self-sufficient One.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Allah, the Eternal, Absolute;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: نزاده، و زاییده نشده است،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: نه زاده است و نه زاده شده،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: نزاده و زاده نشده است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: [كسى را] نزاده، و زاده نشده است،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: نه کسی فرزند اوست و نه او فرزند کسی است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: نزاده است و زاده نشده است. [[«لَمْ یَلِدْ»: فرزندی نزاده است. یعنی نه کسی فرزند او است، و نه او پدر کسی است. «لَمْ یُولَدْ»: زاده نشده است. به دنیا آورده نشده است. یعنی نه فرزند کسی است، و نه کسی پدر او است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: نه فرزند آرد و نه از کسی زاده است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: (هرگز) نزاد، و زاده نشد،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: نه زائید و نه زاده شده‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: نزاده و زاده نشده است.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «(هرگز) نزاد و زاده نشد.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: He has begotten no one, and is begotten of none.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “He has no offspring, nor is He born from anything.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: who has not begotten, and has not been begotten,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: He begetteth not, nor Was He begotten.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "He begets not, nor was He begotten;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: He begets not, nor was He begotten.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: He neither begot any nor was He begotten,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "He begets not, nor was He begotten."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: He begetteth not nor was begotten.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: He neither begat, nor was begotten,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Who has not given birth, and has not been born,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: He neither begets nor is born,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: He neither begets nor was He begotten.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: He begets not, nor is He begotten.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Lam yalid walam yooladu

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: He does not give birth, nor was He born,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;

verses.text: وَ لَمْ‌ يَکُنْ‌ لَهُ‌ کُفُواً أَحَدٌ

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و هیچ کس [در ذات و صفات] همانند و همتا و شبیه او نمی باشد.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و نه هيچ كس همتاى اوست.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و او را هيچ همتايى نباشد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هيچ كس او را همتا نيست.»

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و نه هیچ کس مثل و مانند و همتای اوست.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و کسی همتا و همگون او نمی‌باشد. [[«کُفُواً»: همتا. همگون. یعنی خداگونه‌ای وجود ندارد، و کسی شبیه و همسنگ و همبر او نیست.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و او را هیچ کس همتا نیست‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و برای او هیچگاه شبیه و مانندی نبوده است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و نبودش همتا کسی‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هيچ كس مر او را همتا و همانند نبوده و نباشد.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «و برای او هیچ‌گاه همتا و همپایی نبوده است.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: There is no one comparable to Him."

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “And there is none equal to Him.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and equal to Him is not any one.'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And there hath never been co-equal with Him anyone.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him."

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And there is nothing comparable to Him.”

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and none is comparable to Him.”

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "And there is none comparable to Him."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And there is none comparable unto Him.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: nor has He any equal.’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and there is none equal to Him'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: There is no one equal to Him.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And none is like Him.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Walam yakun lahu kufuwan ahadun

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and there is nothing like Him."

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And there is none like unto Him.
